title: Wall-to-wall carpet, Freeway Access, 24-hour Fitness Center
posting_body: Use this link for more information:
WELCOME TO BAILEY FARM At Bailey Farm it's about living well.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 630 Sq.
Dare to embrace the serenity of small town living!
Make Bailey Farm Apartments your home and spend blissful moments at our pet-friendly community in Bothell, WA.
Conveniently located half an hour away from downtown Seattle, our one and two-bedroom apartments are the perfect getaway if you’re craving that way-too-elusive peace of mind.
With wide-open, well-designed living spaces that seamlessly blend the outdoors with the indoors, coupled with impeccable amenities, we’re an uncommon, yet welcome respite from apartment living.
While sheltered from the big city’s endless agitation, Bailey Farm is close to all the area’s main attractions and employers through WA-527 and I-405.
Our apartments for rent in Bothell, WA, are only 2-miles from Mill Creek Town Center, an outdoor mall with more than 80 shops and restaurants.
Attend concerts at the Bothell Landing Amphitheater, try your luck at the Silver Dollar Casino or have a picnic in one of the nearby parks.
Don’t wait any longer to discover your secret hideaway with nature at your door.
Schedule your tour of our Bothell apartments today!
Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $200.00 per pet.
Use right two lanes to turn right on 164th St SW (signs for Mill Creek)
Destination will be on the left.
Take Exit 183 from I-5 South for 164th St. SW.
Use left two lanes to turn left onto 164th St. SW (signs for Mill Creek)
Destination will be on the left.
